code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{authService}from'../../services/authService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PasswordReset=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await authService.passwordReset(email);setMessage('Password reset link sent to your email');}catch(err){setError('Email not found');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Password Reset"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Reset Password"})]})]});};export default PasswordReset;
